mapper.select: SELECT hopeDt AS start, name AS title FROM schedules
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules (hopeDt, name, gender, hpNo, age, collectYn, thirdPartyYn) VALUES (#{hopeDt}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{hpNo}, #{age}, #{collectYn}, #{thirdPartyYn})
mapper.select: SELECT hopeDt, COUNT(*) as application_count FROM schedules GROUP BY hopeDt
